data.name: CRAYON SHINCHAN The Storm Called! FLAMING KASUKABE RUNNER!!
data.detailed_description:
・Simple and fun action-packed runner game!

An exhilarating runner game featuring everyone's favorite "Crayon Shin-chan"!
Jump past obstacles, collecting sweets and "golden balls" along the way.
Easy-to-use controls mean anyone can jump right in!

・Full of Shin-chan's costumes and reliable crew!

Use the "golden balls" and "medals" earned in-game to collect Shin-chan's costumes from the animated series and movies along with picking up crew along the way.

・Hone your skills and continue challenging!

Not stopping at just clearing a stage, you can continue having fun by aiming for the high score and completing goals, obtaining all the costumes, and gathering the entire crew.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The action-packed "Crayon Shin-chan" runner anyone can casually play is here! Gather various costumes and crew and blaze through the streets of Kasukabe and the world of the movies!
data.supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 series or AMD Ryzen 3 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 series or AMD Ryzen 5 series
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
